summary: This mod allows the player to smith gold coins using gold ingots or smelt them using gold jewelry.
descriptionHtml:
This mod allows the player to smith gold coins using gold ingots or smelt them using gold jewelry.

The player can smith 100 gold with one gold ingot at any forge. You can also use a smelter to turn gold rings and necklaces into gold coins. The player not only gains money, but it also increases the smithing skill. You no longer have to find someone to sell all your gold jewelry to.

There are two versions of this mod. One is what the description says, the other only allows smithing the coins, not smelting them. The smelting is great too, but if you don\'t want it for whatever reason, you don\'t have to have it. You only need to download one, not both.

NO dlc required!
author: chasewj1
